{{Lang|'''Wanyou Boutique'''|zh=万有铺子|zh_rm=Wànyǒu Pùzi}} is a [[shop]] run by [[Bolai]] that can be found in [[Liyue Harbor]] that sells [[Cooking Ingredient]]s. The supplies restock daily.
